concept.title: Stack
concept.shortdesc: A decentralized, automated content pipeline for building and deployed this static HTML5 website using the latest DITA 2.0 standard and the DITA Open Toolkit.

conbody.p: Standard OASIS DITA 2.0 maps and topics are used for content development and defining navigation. Github Actions orchestrate the build processes. The latest stable version of the DITA Open Toolkit is auto-deployed and generates generic HTML5, Python adds additional configurations including responsive CSS. Hosting is provided by Fleek, URI availability is served up through Fleek's gateway and the resulting content is store and pinned on IPFS.
